name: Small Project
description: small project with < 50 KLOC or 200 < classes

name: Medium Project
description: medium project with (50 KLOC <= project <= 250 KLOC) or (200 <= classes <= 1000)

name: Large Project
description: large project with > 250 KLOC or > 1000 classes

name: Number of other types that depend on a given type
Number of other types referenced by a type
Normalized Distance
description: range between 0=exactly located in the main sequence and 1=far from the main sequence
